quotes.q: Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.
quotes.h:
“Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.” —
Og Mandino

quotes.q: Take responsibility of your own happiness, never put it in other people's hands.
quotes.h:
“Take responsibility of your own happiness, never put it in other people's hands.” —
Roy T. Bennett

quotes.q: Self-control is strength.
quotes.h:
“Self-control is strength.” —
James Allen

quotes.q: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.h:
“Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity. ” —
Seneca

quotes.q: Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
quotes.h:
“Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.” —
William Faulkner

quotes.q: We take care of the future best by taking care of the present now.
quotes.h:
“We take care of the future best by taking care of the present now.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.q: Death and life have their determined appointments; riches and honors depend upon heaven.
quotes.h:
“Death and life have their determined appointments; riches and honors depend upon heaven. ” —
Confucius

quotes.q: The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it.
quotes.h:
“The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it. ” —
Genghis Khan

quotes.q: Beware of false knowledge, it is more dangerous than ignorance.
quotes.h:
“Beware of false knowledge, it is more dangerous than ignorance.” —
George Bernard Shaw

quotes.q: Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
quotes.h:
“Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.” —
Roy T. Bennett

quotes.q: You may think I'm small, but I have a universe inside my mind.
quotes.h:
“You may think I'm small, but I have a universe inside my mind.” —
Yoko Ono

quotes.q: If you want more luck, take more chances.
quotes.h:
“If you want more luck, take more chances.” —
Brian Tracy

quotes.q: Man is affected not by events but by the view he takes of them.
quotes.h:
“Man is affected not by events but by the view he takes of them. ” —
Seneca

quotes.q: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
quotes.h:
“Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.” —
F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.q: Only by acceptance of the past, can you alter it.
quotes.h:
“Only by acceptance of the past, can you alter it.” —
T.S. Eliot

quotes.q: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
quotes.h:
“The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance. ” —
Brian Tracy

quotes.q: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any.
quotes.h:
“Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any.” —
Thomas Jefferson

quotes.q: Begin now to be what you will be hereafter.
quotes.h:
“Begin now to be what you will be hereafter.” —
St. Jerome

quotes.q: This is such a short and precious life that it's really important that you don't spend it being unhappy.
quotes.h:
“This is such a short and precious life that it's really important that you don't spend it being unhappy.” —
Naval Ravikant

quotes.q: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
quotes.h:
“Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.” —
John Wooden

quotes.q: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
quotes.h:
“Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes. ” —
Oscar Wilde

quotes.q: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.h:
“There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.” —
Beverly Sills

quotes.q: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
quotes.h:
“Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.” —
John Wooden

quotes.q: The real meditation is how you live your life.
quotes.h:
“The real meditation is how you live your life.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.q: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
quotes.h:
“Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.” —
Sun Tzu

quotes.q: All human wisdom is contained in these two words - Wait and Hope
quotes.h:
“All human wisdom is contained in these two words - Wait and Hope” —
Alexandre Dumas

quotes.q: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
quotes.h:
“Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.” —
Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.q: Just trust that everything is unfolding the way it is supposed to. Don't resist... Great things are waiting for you around the corner.
quotes.h:
“Just trust that everything is unfolding the way it is supposed to. Don't resist... Great things are waiting for you around the corner.” —
Sonia Ricotti

quotes.q: If you don't know, the thing to do is not to get scared, but to learn.
quotes.h:
“If you don't know, the thing to do is not to get scared, but to learn.” —
Ayn Rand

quotes.q: Leaders spend 5% of their time on the problem & 95% of their time on the solution. Get over it & crush it!
quotes.h:
“Leaders spend 5% of their time on the problem & 95% of their time on the solution. Get over it & crush it!” —
Tony Robbins

quotes.q: A dream doesn't become reality through magic it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.h:
“A dream doesn't become reality through magic it takes sweat, determination and hard work.” —
Colin Powell

quotes.q: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.h:
“The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.” —
Bette Midler

quotes.q: As you grow older you will discover that you have two hands. One for helping yourself, the other for helping others.
quotes.h:
“As you grow older you will discover that you have two hands. One for helping yourself, the other for helping others.” —
Audrey Hepburn

quotes.q: It's the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
quotes.h:
“It's the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.” —
Albus Dumbledore

quotes.q: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece
quotes.h:
“Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece” —
John Wooden

quotes.q: Any idea, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.
quotes.h:
“Any idea, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.” —
Napoleon Hill

quotes.q: We cannot expect to be happy always... by experiencing evil as well as good we become wise.
quotes.h:
“We cannot expect to be happy always... by experiencing evil as well as good we become wise.” —
Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.q: Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker.
quotes.h:
“Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker. ” —
Zig Ziglar

quotes.q: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.h:
“Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.” —
Conrad Hilton

quotes.q: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.h:
“Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.” —
Helen Keller

quotes.q: Without the rain there would be no rainbow.
quotes.h:
“Without the rain there would be no rainbow.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

quotes.q: Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.
quotes.h:
“Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.q: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
quotes.h:
“The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.” —
James Matthew Barrie

quotes.q: Some people are old at 18 and some are young at 90. Time is a concept that humans created.
quotes.h:
“Some people are old at 18 and some are young at 90. Time is a concept that humans created.” —
Yoko Ono

quotes.q: Intelligent people make many mistakes because they cannot believe the world is really as foolish as it is.
quotes.h:
“Intelligent people make many mistakes because they cannot believe the world is really as foolish as it is.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.q: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.h:
“Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.” —
Oscar Wilde

quotes.q: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life.
quotes.h:
“Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life. ” —
Eckhart Tolle

quotes.q: You are a function of what the whole universe is doing in the same way that a wave is a function of what the whole ocean is doing.
quotes.h:
“You are a function of what the whole universe is doing in the same way that a wave is a function of what the whole ocean is doing.” —
Alan Watts

quotes.q: From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached.
quotes.h:
“From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached.” —
Franz Kafka

quotes.q: To do two things at once is to do neither.
quotes.h:
“To do two things at once is to do neither.” —
Publilius Syrus

ideas.body: A second idea is nearly as good as a first idea
And a final idea for the day
